replies.author: Wsbyeah
replies.txt_content:
win 转 ANSI 码
Linux 转 utf8 码
转码工具 百度 notepad

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
下载notepad++来更改文件的编码
然后将文件ANSI 和UTF8无BOM格式都试下
